messages.Default: User-friendly WYSIWYG editor, provides basic features like text formatting, inserting images, links, tables and more.
messages.Ace: Advanced editor with syntax highlighting, code folding, auto-completion and more, made for developers.
messages.Raw: Editor without any formatting. For advanced users only, that want to write HTML code directly.

tooltips.headerPosition: Has no effect in Puppeteer PDF engine. Instead, use styling to position the header.
tooltips.footerPosition: Has no effect in Puppeteer PDF engine. Instead, use styling to position the footer.
